case.title: If Your Ultimate Goal is a LTR
case.text: Girl-next-door, all-american, cute, athletic, energetic, unattached, happy-go-lucky, emotionally available and then some, seeking boy-next-boy type for a genuine relationship and see where it takes us. Me: 5'11"; absolutely fit; blonde hair. You: MUST be 35 years to 55 years; fit; attractive; and AT LEAST 5'11." Must have a job you are happy with and a life you are happy with. Not looking to save or be saved! Please respond with picture and description of yourself :)
